In England, in the seven days to 08 March, there were 33,400 new confirmed cases (59.3 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 01 March, there were 41,919 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 20% (8,519 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 13 March is 3,723,811 (6,615.8 cases per 100,000 population).
